actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish an Export Promotion and Information Center.
short_title: Export Promotion and Information Center Act

summary.text: Export Promotion and Information Center Act - Establishes within the Office of the Secretary of Commerce the Export Promotion and Information Center. Requires the Director of the Center to develop and maintain an export information system and to coordinate the gathering and dissemination of international trade information conducted by various Federal, State, and local agencies. Establishes an Export Promotion and Information Policy Board to advise the Director. Sets forth administrative provisions governing the Center and the Policy Board. Provides for fees to be charged by the Center for information. Establishes in the Treasury an Export Promotion and Information Trust Fund. Authorizes appropriations for the Trust Fund for FY 1986 through 1992. Terminates the Center on September 30, 1992.

titles.title: Export Promotion and Information Center Act
A bill to establish an Export Promotion and Information Center.
